title: Zed needs a Batman Skin
body:
the shuriken = batarangs
the spin = batman cape spin
the shadow = darknight shadow

replies.body: You know that one is a cold-blooded assassin and the other one never kills people, right?

> [{quoted}](name=FNC Saki,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=aFyUzuO2,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-11T04:47:41.782+0000)
>
> You know that one is a cold-blooded assassin and the other one never kills people, right?

lol why would that matter?
we have plenty of lethal champs with non-lethal version skins

yo, shaco = joker
 zyra = poison ivy
idk = bane
idk = penquin

so on...
shame riot can't get away with the stuff it use to be able to... lol king rammus
